prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered howling pose with head tilted toward lunar geometry, chibi proportions with large wave translucent dimensional head with unique Vesica Piscis structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying gentle dimensional. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating Vesica Piscis, Wave Spiral, Merkaba lattice patterns, styled with guides gentle influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by lunar and neutral grey inspired by silver angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, elaborate with shifting Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and Vesica Piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions with gentle spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor AMBRIOL's profile: 'He who continuously comforts', Aethyr LOE, Fire element, Tarot The Moon, Sephirot Yesod, Zodiac Pisces, embodying the essence: 'When AMBRIOL stands before you, turmoil hushes into a gentle lullaby storm-tossed hearts are soothed by ember-warm dreams of solace.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

profile_data.title: 'He who continuously comforts'
profile_data.essence: When AMBRIOL stands before you, turmoil hushes into a gentle lullaby storm-tossed hearts are soothed by ember-warm dreams of solace.
profile_data.angelic_role: Angel of Dreamful Respite; guides zephyr-bound messengers.
profile_data.form_description: A mercurial, wave-like humanoid form that shifts between liquid fire and translucent mist, representing the liminal space between dream and consciousness in the LOE Aethyr
profile_data.color_reasoning: Indigo represents intuition and the lunar qualities of Pisces, while silver-blue connects to Yesod's mystical realm and the dreaming consciousness of The Moon tarot archetype
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries that represent transformation, dimensional transit, and the fluid boundaries between conscious states
